screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 50) offset = 40 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 90 wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (560 > wsizex): wsizex = 560 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex, 94) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) self.instance.move(ePoint((1920-wsizex-200), (1080-wsizey)/5))
